data.persona: I am a resident of the village near the river. I live in a small cabin with a garden. I am anxious and worried a lot.
data.description:
You are in the Port Skyline.
The local port sits an a majestic inlet of the ocean. The countless docks are constantly bustling with new arrivals and departures. People of all kinds come here for business or leisure. On the shore sits a skyline of many buildings packed with residents going about their day. The smell of salt and seafood fills the air.
The guard is here.

You are carrying a polishing cloths, a leather cloth, and a shovel, and wearing an apron and a skirt.

data.short_motivation: I am setting up my workstation at the port
data.mid_motivation: I will clean people's shoes for a small sum of money, as I do everyday
data.long_motivation: I will save up the proceeds from polishing people's shoes until I have a sizable amount of savings for emergencies

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: eat a meal for the day

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: get polishing cloth and leather cloth

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: use polishing cloth with leather cloth

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: wield polishing cloth to wipe a person's shoes to cleanliness
